WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi TIA,

Thanks for your feedback, we consider this really valuable. Brian Noyes confirmed in the following forum thread that they updated this tool: http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=224259. 
Therefore, you can download the latest release from http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/releases/view/14771#DownloadId=151028

Thanks again.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
WorkItem.Description:
The document of Prism 4 mentioned using the open source tool ManifestManagerUtility for ClickOnce to deploy WPF apps. It is really helpful. However the tool appears having some issues:
 
1) The GlobalAssemblyInfo.cs file is missing from the zip file so the project can't be build; any solution or fix?
 
2) The latest release is in 2008; any upcoming release for .NET 4?
 
3) The sample code Prism 4 document mentioned is missing (Quickstarts\Modularity\ConfigurationModularity QuickStart solution); I assume the team is still working on it.
 
TIA.
